call_title: Ergo PoW Blockchain - Community Chat - December 18th (time: 17 UTC)

decisions.decision: Testing community-run market making over the next month or two with community members using their bots
decisions.speaker: Qx
decisions.context: Transition from EF-funded market making to community-managed solution
decisions.quote: So that is something that we're going to be testing over the next month or two. We're going to have some people perhaps give that a try, see how that goes

decisions.decision: Continue main Ergo Explorer by running beefy explorer with Qx and shipping another machine to Jamai
decisions.speaker: Qx
decisions.context: P2P DAO can handle 99% of queries but not massive queries requiring 120GB RAM
decisions.quote: So the solution around that, just to keep you guys informed, is to run the beefy explorer that I have here with me. And I have another machine that will ship to Jamai

commitments.commitment: Game of Prompts interface and contract will likely be completed before the end of the year
commitments.timeline: before the end of the year
commitments.quote: Game of Prompts finishing up the interface in the contract, likely have it completed before the end of the year

commitments.commitment: Make a PR to add VoltPay.Store to Nautilus buy button
commitments.quote: I think I will make a PR, yeah

commitments.commitment: Add two million FAKU to Ergo Santa campaign
commitments.quote: Okay, I will do two million then

commitments.commitment: Send one million FAKU to Ergo Santa
commitments.quote: There's a million FAKU coming. It's inbound now

key_facts.fact: Market making costs about $10,000 or $12,000 every quarter
key_facts.speaker: Qx

key_facts.fact: Hetzner bill for main explorers is about 680 euro (720 freedom dollars) per month
key_facts.speaker: Qx

key_facts.fact: Main explorers require machines with about 120 gigs of RAM for massive queries
key_facts.speaker: Qx

key_facts.fact: Krux added DEX LP swapping and extracted SOC to NFT on token from Ergotry constants
key_facts.speaker: Qx

key_facts.fact: Lithos released version 2.2.0 with multi-threaded sync process and sorted APIs
key_facts.speaker: Qx
